column4: with lots of gtk applications -- i am getting my terminal full of " Gtk-CRITICAL **: gtk_paint_box: assertion " errors -- can i ignore these (i.e turn them off)
those are harmless asserts that fail in the core GTK code. I think there was a patch on bugzilla to disable them but I don't have it in my history.
professional is not the first word that comes to my mind.. Besides, those are ages old, I don't think they are getting removed any time soon..
